verbs.description: [ARG0: France 's President Emmanuel Macron] [V: greeted] [ARG1: President Donald Trump] [ARGM-MNR: with a French peck on the cheek] [ARGM-TMP: as the U.S. leader welcomed him to the White House for a State Visit] .
